column14: Love this lip colour! It is richly pigmented, and does not irritate my very sensitive lips. Would purchase again.

column6: Non-drying, color rich lip color, ingenious built in sharpener - Heirloom color
column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2016
column14: Saw this color online and decided to take the plunge and purchase it online.  Product arrived quickly and well packaged (no broken makeup issues at all).  Crayon color is very rich and highly pigmented, which is a plus for me.  I love the built-in sharpener at the end of the lip crayon, too.  So far, Glo minerals does not disappoint!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2016
column14: Bloom- Creamy, non-drying, rich color, long lasting too.  So far I have been really happy with Glominerals lip colors.  I would describe Bloom as a medium pink color with red tones.  It's not a neutral pink like Willow or Bella, which I find closer to skin tone than a true pink.  Bloom is deeper in color than Heirloom, which is more of a dusty rose color.  It's hard to determine color based on the illustrations provided so hopefully my description will help some.

column6: Too soft in texture for a lip crayon
column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2019
column14: Too soft for a crayon lipstick.  Also too pale in color for my taste ; I prefer a darker shade of orange.  If you like a light shade in matte, this would work for you.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2018
column14: Love the heirloom color and the look and feel of this BUT I have purchased 2 crayons (cuz I figured the first must have been a mistake or i am just an idiot when it comes to sharpening this crayon!) and neither came with a built-in sharpener. In fact, I have spent a lot of time trying to figure out how to get more out of the stick than what shows on the tip initially.  Going to call Glo Skin tomorrow. Otherwise this is just a very expensive SAMPLE.

column14: I didn't put the lipstick out too far but it broke off on my first use. That's an expensive one time use.

column14: Very flattering color for my olive skin tone. Formula is very creamy. Only con is no built in sunscreen.
